heading: HR00952
0:
RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES THROUGH
THE COMMITTEE ON TRANSPORTATION TO CONDUCT AN
INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, INTO THE BANNING OF THE
OPERATION OF PUBLIC UTILITY JEEPNEYS (PUJs)
UNDER THE GENERAL COMMUNITY QUARANTINE (GCQ) AND THE
APPARENT JEEPNEY PHASE-OUT SCHEME UNDER THE LTFRB
MEMORANDUM CIRCULAR NO. 2020-17, AFFECTING THE MOBILITY AND
TRANSPORT OF THOUSANDS OF WORKERS AND COMMUTERS
